@package ch4
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | <pre>
--   "A solution using divide-and-conquer"
--   </pre>
module MaxSubArray

-- | The <a>maxSubArray</a> function returns the maximum subarray from
--   within an array
maxSubArray :: (Num a, Ord a) => [a] -> [a]


-- | <pre>
--   "A linear-time algorithm"
--   </pre>
module MaxSubArrayLinear

-- | Function to calculate maximum subarray using an O(n) alorithm
maxSubarray :: [Int] -> [Int]
